transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%

SKT_FIRST.name: Trigger Happy
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the ally with the highest Attack by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases the Priority of all allies\nIncreases Priority by 10%

description: Attacks an enemy and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the ally with the highest Attack by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000012_1_1]</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Lucky or Die
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Increases all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Critical Damage</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Gains an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color> after using this skill.
description: Increases all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Critical Damage</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000012_2_1] turn(s)</color>. Gains an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color> after using this skill.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: My Bloody Valentine
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and reduces the target's Priority by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and reduces the target's Priority by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000012_3_1]</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Critical Damage of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the ally with the highest Attack by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000012_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase Critical Damage of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000012_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the ally with the highest Attack by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000012_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
